title: Introduction
content:
Choosing the right paid packs is crucial because some packs offer significantly more value than others. Not all packs are created equal, and the benefits they provide can vary greatly.

By carefully selecting the most profitable packs, you can get the best return on your investment. This strategic choice can give you a substantial advantage in the game, ensuring that you maximize the benefits from your purchases.

Therefore, itâ€™s essential to evaluate and compare the available packs to make informed decisions that will enhance your gaming experience.

title: Cat Fortune Event
content:
Before anything else, you should know that the Cat Fortune is the best moment to invest in the game. It offers the possibility to gain a Bonus of White Gems , investing 5, 10, 20, 50, and 100 dollars (up to 3 times).

By investing in the Cat Fortune, you'll get a bonus between x1.1 and x3 on your purchase. This is the best time to buy gems, as you will get more for your money.

title: Event passes
content:
Each event in the game offers the opportunity to purchase two types of passes: one for $1 and another for $10. The rewards provided by these passes are generally very good, and even better during collaboration events.

By completing the pass, you will receive approximately 140 draws, which guarantees you at least one unique event reward. Additionally, you will have a chance to obtain the mount, artifact, or awakening crystal featured in the event.Event passes are really worth it.
